title: Add Google Site Verification meta tag to homepage

requirements.text: Add the Google Site Verification meta tag `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="op0cJomiNM3AovX7LRR0RVy9JRJJjxlW7qdfJFYmo5Y" />` to the `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html`, placed before the first `<body>` tag.
acceptanceCriteria: The exact tag `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="op0cJomiNM3AovX7LRR0RVy9JRJJjxlW7qdfJFYmo5Y" />` is present in the `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html`.
The meta tag appears before the closing `</head>` tag and before any `<body>` tag.
No existing meta tags, title, or other head elements are removed or modified.

constraints: Do not modify any file other than frontend/index.html.
Do not alter any existing meta tags, the page title, or other head elements.
nonGoals: Any changes to React components or backend code.
Any other SEO or meta tag additions beyond the specified Google Site Verification tag.
